Description: Epiphone G-400 SG Electric Guitar Faded Cherry, Excellent Condition (710) Epiphone G-400 SG Electric Guitar Faded Cherry, Excellent Condition This 6-string electric guitar is up for auction. It has been tested, awesome sound. Soft case included. Title: Epiphone G-400 SG Electric Guitar Faded Cherry, Excellent Condition (710)

Charity.Mission:
The Salvation Army, an international movement, is an evangelical part of the universal Christian

ConditionDescription: Pre-owned. Guitar is in nearly flawless condition, the only noticeable defect is a scratch just above the bridge. It is a bit hard to see, but it can be felt. On the reverse, there is also what looks like a paint spot right on the bevel. It does not feel like damage, and it could probably be chemically removed.
